HOMEWOOD,BALTIMORE, MD., APRIL 16, 1929

IULA TO BE AT
JUNIOR HELL DANCE
"Bob" Jula and eight pieces
of his musk will be present at
the Junior Hell Dance on Saturday, May 4, at Lehmann's
Hall, from 9:30 to 1 :30.
As an added attraction, a
prize will be given to the best
dressed couple at the dance.
This prize has not been decided upon.

THREE IMPORTANTINNOVATIONS ON
PROGRAM GIVEN FOR JUNE WEEK

NEWS-LETTER TO HOLD
ANNUAL BANQUET
On Tuesday, April 23, the
NEws-LErrEn will hold it. annual banquet for staff members.
The affair is to be at The
Robin on North Howard St.
The entire staff is invited.
Elections for next year will be
held during the course of the
evening.
A number of prominent men
on the campus will be the
guests of honor. The hoer has
been set for seven o'clock.

IULA TO BE AT
JUNIOR HELL DANCE
"Bob" Jula and eight pieces
of his musk will be present at
the Junior Hell Dance on Saturday, May 4, at Lehmann's
Hall, from 9:30 to 1 :30.
As an added attraction, a
prize will be given to the best
dressed couple at the dance.
This prize has not been decided upon.

ANNUAL BANQUET
On Tuesday, April 23, the
NEws-LErrEn will hold it. annual banquet for staff members.
The affair is to be at The
Robin on North Howard St.
The entire staff is invited.
Elections for next year will be
held during the course of the
evening.
A number of prominent men
on the campus will be the
guests of honor. The hoer has
been set for seven o'clock.
